comments.body:
I think this should be 
```golang
t.Error(err)
return
```
otherwise if the first subtest fails, it won't run the other one

t.Fatal calls runtime.Goexit()

> I think this should be
> 
> t.Error(err)
> return
> otherwise if the first subtest fails, it won't run the other one
> 
> t.Fatal calls runtime.Goexit()

I don't know how it works, but I just tried it.  Calling fatal only fatals the subtest
